root.name: liZboa
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by vectrLab, lizBoa is a survival horror first person shooter and its action takes place in its entirety in Lisboa/Lisbon, the Portuguese capital city. The action will take place in and around famous Lisbon buildings and locations. Its release is due to a still unknown date, somewhere in 2011.Â StoryThe player takes the role of one of the survivors of a strange epidemic that turns people into zombies.
